about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Globe Textiles (India) Limited is Ahmedabad Gujrat based company engaged in manufacturing of Garments, cotton printed fabrics, home textiles and fancy fabrics. Company is also engaged in trading of yarns, denims and Non denims fabrics, Shirting fabrics and Jeans.

Globe Textiles has 3 manufacturing units located in and around Ahmedabad. Company caters both domestic as well as international markets.

COMPETITIVE STRENGTHS
• Key customer base with reputed international Customers
• Cost effective production and timely fulfillment of orders
• Scalable Business Model

faqs.question: What is the Globe Textiles IPO?
faqs.answer:
Globe Textiles IPO is a SME IPO of 2688000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹13.71 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹51 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on June 12, 2017, and closes on June 15, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Globe Textiles IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Globe Textiles IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Globe Textiles IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Globe Textiles IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Globe Textiles IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: The Globe Textiles IPO opens on June 12, 2017 and closes on June 15, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Globe Textiles IPO?
faqs.answer: Globe Textiles IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,02,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Globe Textiles IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Globe Textiles IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
